result.title: Personalize the Experience
result.content: Get more out of Bark by registering with Bark.

result.title: What do I need?
result.content:
You'll need:
  • A username -> that hasn't already registered to Bark
  • A .ac.uk email -> Bark is for students, so we keep it that way!
  • Account Password -> Keep you safe and secure

Optional Profile Picture -> It's nice to see who you are, but don't worry if you don't like seeing your face online you aren't required to give one. You can change your image at anytime
